### ç«‹å³ä½“éªŒVForm 3 [åœ¨çº¿Demo](http://120.92.142.115:81/vform3/) ### ğŸ‰ğŸ‰åŸºäºVForm3çš„å…¨æ ˆä½ä»£ç å¹³å°å·²å‘å¸ƒğŸ‰ğŸ‰ ![meta_low_code](https://vform666.com/mele.png)
[ç¾ä¹ä½ä»£ç â€”â€”ç«‹å³è¿›å…¥](https://melecode.com/) ï¼ˆç§æœ‰éƒ¨ç½²ã€å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨ï¸ï¼Œå·²å¼€æºâœŒâœŒï¼‰ï¸ ### ç«‹å³ä½“éªŒVForm 3 Proé«˜çº§ç‰ˆï¼ˆæä¾›å•†ä¸šæ”¯æŒï¼‰ [VForm 3 Pro Demo](https://www.vform666.com/pro/) ### è§†é¢‘æ•™ç¨‹é›†åˆï¼š [Bç«™è§‚çœ‹](https://space.bilibili.com/626932375) ### é€‚åˆVue 2çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ [ç‚¹æ­¤æŸ¥çœ‹](https://gitee.com/vdpadmin/variant-form) ### å‹æƒ…é“¾æ¥ [Fantastic-admin](https://hooray.gitee.io/fantastic-admin/) â€”â€” ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„ Vue ä¸­åå°ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæ¡†æ¶ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒVue2/Vue3ï¼‰ ### åŠŸèƒ½ä¸€è§ˆ ``` > æ‹–æ‹½å¼å¯è§†åŒ–è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡ï¼› > æ”¯æŒPCã€Padã€H5ä¸‰ç§å¸ƒå±€ï¼› > æ”¯æŒè¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½è¡¨å•ï¼› > æ”¯æŒè¡¨å•å¤æ‚äº¤äº’æ§åˆ¶ï¼› > æ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰CSSæ ·å¼ï¼› > æ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ¡éªŒé€»è¾‘ï¼› > æ”¯æŒå›½é™…åŒ–å¤šè¯­è¨€ï¼› > å¯å¯¼å‡ºVueç»„ä»¶ã€HTMLæºç ï¼› > å¯å¯¼å‡ºVueçš„SFCå•æ–‡ä»¶ç»„ä»¶ï¼› > æ”¯æŒå¼€å‘è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼› > æ”¯æŒå“åº”å¼è‡ªé€‚åº”å¸ƒå±€ï¼› > æ”¯æŒVS Codeæ’ä»¶ï¼› > æ›´å¤šåŠŸèƒ½ç­‰ä½ æ¢ç©¶...ï¼› ``` ### å®‰è£…ä¾èµ– ``` npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com ``` ### å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯• ``` npm run serve ``` ### ç”Ÿäº§æ‰“åŒ… ``` npm run build ``` ### è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨ + è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“å™¨æ‰“åŒ… ``` npm run lib ``` ### è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“å™¨æ‰“åŒ… ``` npm run lib-render ``` ### æµè§ˆå™¨å…¼å®¹æ€§ ```Chromeï¼ˆåŠåŒå†…æ ¸çš„æµè§ˆå™¨å¦‚QQæµè§ˆå™¨ã€360æµè§ˆå™¨ç­‰ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼ŒFirefoxï¼ŒSafari```
### è·ŸVue 3.xé¡¹ç›®é›†æˆ
#### 1. å®‰è£…åŒ… ```bash npm i vform3-builds ``` æˆ– ```bash yarn add vform3-builds ```
#### 2. å¼•å…¥å¹¶å…¨å±€æ³¨å†ŒVForm 3ç»„ä»¶ ``` import { createApp } from 'vue' import App from './App.vue' import ElementPlus from 'element-plus' //å¼•å…¥element-plusåº“ import 'element-plus/dist/index.css' //å¼•å…¥element-plusæ ·å¼ import VForm3 from 'vform3-builds' //å¼•å…¥VForm 3åº“ import 'vform3-builds/dist/designer.style.css' //å¼•å…¥VForm3æ ·å¼ const app = createApp(App) app.use(ElementPlus) //å…¨å±€æ³¨å†Œelement-plus app.use(VForm3) //å…¨å±€æ³¨å†ŒVForm 3(åŒæ—¶æ³¨å†Œäº†v-form-designerå’Œv-form-renderç»„ä»¶) app.mount('#app') ```
#### 3. åœ¨Vue 3.xæ¨¡æ¿ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨ç»„ä»¶ ```bash ```
#### 4. åœ¨Vue 3.xæ¨¡æ¿ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“å™¨ç»„ä»¶ ```html ```
### èµ„æºé“¾æ¥
æ–‡æ¡£å®˜ç½‘ï¼šhttps://www.vform666.com/ åœ¨çº¿æ¼”ç¤ºï¼šhttp://120.92.142.115:81/vform3/ Githubä»“åº“ï¼šhttps://github.com/vform666/variant-form3-vite Giteeä»“åº“ï¼šhttps://gitee.com/vdpadmin/variant-form3-vite æ›´æ–°æ—¥å¿—ï¼šhttps://www.vform666.com/changelog.html è®¢é˜…Proç‰ˆï¼šhttps://www.vform666.com/pro/ æŠ€æœ¯äº¤æµç¾¤ï¼šæ‰«å¦‚ä¸‹äºŒç»´ç åŠ ç¾¤ ![image](https://vform2022.ks3-cn-beijing.ksyuncs.com/vchat_qrcode.png)

files.name: index.html
install-render.js
install.js
files.content:
import axios from 'axios'

import VFormDesigner from '@/components/form-designer/index.vue'
import VFormRender from '@/components/form-render/index.vue'

import Draggable from '@/../lib/vuedraggable/dist/vuedraggable.umd.js'
import {registerIcon} from '@/utils/el-icons'
import 'virtual:svg-icons-register'
import '@/iconfont/iconfont.css'

import ContainerWidgets from '@/components/form-designer/form-widget/container-widget/index'
import ContainerItems from '@/components/form-render/container-item/index'

import { addDirective } from '@/utils/directive'
import { installI18n } from '@/utils/i18n'
import { loadExtension } from '@/extension/extension-loader'


VFormDesigner.install = function (app) {
  addDirective(app)
  installI18n(app)
  loadExtension(app)

  app.use(ContainerWidgets)
  app.use(ContainerItems)

  registerIcon(app)
  app.component('draggable', Draggable)
  app.component(VFormDesigner.name, VFormDesigner)
}

VFormRender.install = function (app) {
  installI18n(app)
  loadExtension(app)

  app.use(ContainerItems)

  registerIcon(app)
  app.component(VFormRender.name, VFormRender)
}

const components = [
  VFormDesigner,
  VFormRender
]

const install = (app) => {
  addDirective(app)
  installI18n(app)
  loadExtension(app)

  app.use(ContainerWidgets)
  app.use(ContainerItems)

  registerIcon(app)
  app.component('draggable', Draggable)

  components.forEach(component => {
    app.component(component.name, component)
  })

  window.axios = axios
}

if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.Vue) { /* scriptæ–¹å¼å¼•å…¥æ—¶èµ‹å€¼axiosï¼ï¼ */
  //window.axios = axios
}

export default {
  install,
  VFormDesigner,
  VFormRender
}

files.name: package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "variant-form3",
  "version": "3.0.10",
  "private": false,
  "scripts": {
    "serve": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "lib": "vite build --config vite-lib.config.js",
    "lib-render": "vite build --config vite-lib-render.config.js",
    "preview": "vite preview"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@element-plus/icons-vue": "^0.2.4",
    "axios": "^0.24.0",
    "clipboard": "^2.0.8",
    "core-js": "^3.6.5",
    "element-plus": "^2.2.22",
    "file-saver": "^2.0.5",
    "mitt": "^3.0.0",
    "sortablejs": "1.14.0",
    "vue": "^3.2.32",
    "vue3-quill": "^0.2.6"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@rollup/plugin-commonjs": "^21.0.1",
    "@types/node": "^17.0.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-vue": "^2.0.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-vue-jsx": "^1.3.3",
    "ace-builds": "^1.4.12",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.1.0",
    "mvdir": "^1.0.21",
    "rollup-plugin-external-globals": "^0.6.1",
    "rollup-plugin-visualizer": "^5.5.2",
    "sass": "^1.45.0",
    "vite": "2.7.3",
    "vite-plugin-svg-icons": "^1.0.5"
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "> 1%",
    "last 2 versions",
    "not dead"
  ]
}
